name: emancipatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
giving people social or political freedom and rights: To the women of France, the war had brought an emancipatory revolution. Poetry, fiction and drama can be more emancipatory than revolutionary politics.
More examplesFewer examplesWe feminists should not underrate the emancipatory power of the dishwasher.Genuinely emancipatory action depends on correcting problems of thought first.Emancipatory knowledge helps us to understand how social relationships are distorted and manipulated by relations of power and privilege.
